entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugluktuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:24 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -40.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugluktuk Airport 7:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -40.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -52
Dewpoint: -44.9°C
Wind: SW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Temperature steady near minus 40.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 40. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A few clouds. High minus 38.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 38. Wind chill minus 54 in the morning and minus 48 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 24 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 24 by morning. Wind chill minus 48 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
